title: Discover
description: We begin with an initial consultation to customize our services to fit your project and timeline, taking into account your company, industry, required features, and design preferences.

title: Moodboards & Wireframes
description: We will develop mood boards showcasing potential creative directions and app screen examples that align with your project's specifications. Next, we'll create wireframes outlining the screen structure and integrate previous analytics findings to optimize the user journey.

title: Design Concepts
description: After incorporating feedback from the mood board and finalizing the grayscale prototype, we will create a design concept for a select few screens that align with the chosen creative direction. Once approved, we'll proceed to design the remaining screens.

title: Delivery
description: Once the designs are finalized, we will share the development-ready Figma files, which include all styling information and necessary assets. We are also available to assist with any questions the developers may have.
